fact_check.explanation:
The web search results overwhelmingly confirm that Dharmendra passed away on November 24, 2025. Multiple credible news sources, including BBC and NDTV, report his death at the age of 89. The search results also include details about his funeral and tributes from Bollywood celebrities.
